1: <pb/><t>Ay minas bay chi ilay eltek ch'en plata, ay c'apax bay chi watx'ji ch'en oro.</t>
2: <t>A ch'en hierro chi ilay el ch'en bay tx'otx' tx'otx', axa ch'en ch'en xin, a yet chi tz'a ch'en, chi eltek ch'en cobre yin.</t>
3: <t>A eb anima, c'amxa yelapnok k'ekk'inal bay eb; chi aytok eb bay yulak olan tol najat yich. A bay xol k'ekk'inal tu', a tu' chi say eb ch'en ch'en.</t>
4: <t>Chi jakajtek eb minas bay najat ayil bay tilak conob, a ton bay juntzan lugar bay c'amxa chi ec' anima, ayxa is may. Yetokxa lasu chi ec' t'ununok eb.</t>
5: <t>A bay sat tx'otx' tx'otx', chi ch'ibaj tzet chi loji, axa bay yalan tx'otx', uchquiltak yayji axca tol yuj k'ak'ej.</t>
6: <t>A bay tu', chi ilchaj ch'en zafiro, yetok ch'en oro soman yetok tx'otx'ej.</t>
7: <t>Tamwal no tx'acbaj, tam junokxa makan no no', chi ilchaj beal minas tu' yuj.</t>
8: <t>A no chiwajwom no' c'amxa chi ec' no' bay tu', tamwal no coj.</t>
9: <t>A eb winak chi oc lacan eb bay yinlak sat ch'en tu', cax chi c'oli joton ajtek eb xelak mimek witz.</t>
10: <t>Chi jot eb olan najat chi yun yich bay satlak ch'en, cax chi sayon yil eb masanil pojanil beyomal ay bay tu'.</t>
11: <t>Chi jakon ajtek eb nuk'lak aej bay tu', cax chi yion ajtek eb bay sakk'inal tzet yetal tol ewanc'uan yayji.</t>
12: <pb/><t>Palta ¿baytal chi ca tit oc jelanilal? ¿Tzet lugaril bay ay aj nabalil tu'?</t>
13: <t>Man yojtakok eb anima jantak yelapnok jun tu', tamwal chi ilchaj aj xol eb.</t>
14: <t>Caxc'al chi co sayic' bay najatil yich a' mar, man ok ilchaj juj bay tu'.</t>
15: <t>C'am chi je' co manon yetok oro, tamwal yetok plata.</t>
16: <t>C'am chi je' chi tojlanelay yetok oro caw wal watx', tamwal yetok ch'en cornalina ma ch'en zafiro.</t>
17: <t>Xiwil is tojol yintak ch'en oro c'al ch'en vidrio, c'am chi je' chi q'uexlay yetok ch'en naba oro watx'nebilxa.</t>
18: <t>A jelanilal yelxac'al ochebil yintak ch'en coral; a ch'en cuarzo c'al ch'en perla c'am chi je' lajlen ba yetok.</t>
19: <t>A ch'en crisólito chi tit bay Etiopía c'am chi je' lajlen ba yetok, tamwal chi je' chi tojlanelay yetok ch'en oro yelxac'al watx'.</t>
20: <t>¿Baytal chi ca tit oc jelanilal tu xin? ¿Tzet lugaril bay chi ilchaj jun aj nabalil tu'?</t>
21: <t>A jun tu' c'uan el bay masanil anima iquis, toltax c'am chi yil no tz'iquin.</t>
22: <t>A cajlub pixanej c'al camich, max yal eb axca ti': A is k'umal jun tu' toc'al max sajlay jabej, ẍi eb.</t>
23: <pb/><t>Palta a Dios yojtak beal jelanilal; asan Cham yojtak bay chi ilchaj yuj.</t>
24: <t>Yujtol chi yil Cham masanil is lajubal tx'otx' tx'otx', yetokc'al masanil tzet yetal ay bay yalan satcan ti'.</t>
25: <t>A yet max watx'nencan oc Dios yipalil cak'ek', c'al yaoncan oc mojonal a' aej,</t>
26: <t>a yet max watx'nencan oc leyalil nabilk'inal c'al tx'oxoncan oc beal rayo c'al mak'waj c'u,</t>
27: <t>a yet tu', max yilon c'apax jelanilal tol caw wal miman yelapnok, max beyc'ulneni, max yilon xin tol watx' toni.</t>
28: <t>Max yalon Dios bay eb anima axca ti': Ta miman welapnok yul e sat, a ton wal jelanilal tu'; ta che poj wal el e ba xol yobtakilal, a ton wal aj nabalil tu xin, ẍi Cham, ẍi cham Job.</t>
